com.timerunner.states

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • com.timerunner.states.GlobalState
        • com.timerunner.states.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlledInputReciever, ControllerListener, InputListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, GameState

    public class GameState
extends GlobalState
    The Class GameState. The GameState manage the Game Engine.
